thag1.7:1.1: He has swept away the army of the King of Death,
thag1.7:1.2: as a great flood, a fragile bridge of reeds.
thag1.7:1.3: Victorious since his fears have vanished:
thag1.7:1.4: tame and steadfast, he has become extinguished.
thag1.7:1.5: That is how this verse was recited by the senior venerable Bhalliya.
